segments.text: I see the woman so focused, her back to the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost humorous how oblivious she is to the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there’s a dark cloud of anxiety hanging over this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks a little too confident for my liking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He keeps reaching up, his fingers almost grazing the top of the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance seems fragile; I catch myself hoping he won't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands like a statue, her hand raised, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like it’s teetering on the edge of something disastrous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just glance back for a moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange blend of innocence and carelessness, all wrapped in the mundane.
segments.speaker: PAR
